citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on
18-Sep-17.
Knocked on the front door.
Licensee was contacted by cell phone and she was not available for an inspection.

narrative:
